Rule.NonCompliantComment: GDM is installed on the system, which may allow unauthorized graphical logins.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Remove the GDM package to disable the graphical login manager.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: The GDM login banner is not configured, leaving users without a proper warning.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure a login banner in /etc/gdm3/custom.conf to display an appropriate message.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: The GDM user list is not disabled, potentially exposing local user information.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable the user list in GDM by setting the disable-user-list option to true.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: GDM is not configured to lock the screen when idle, which may allow unauthorized access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure GDM to automatically lock the screen when the user is idle.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: The GDM screen lock settings may be overridden by users.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Enforce screen lock settings in GDM so that they cannot be overridden.
Rule.Correction: (Manual enforcement required: review and lock down the settings via policy)

Rule.NonCompliantComment: Automatic mounting of removable media is enabled in GDM.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable automatic mounting of removable media in GDM.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: The setting to disable automatic mounting of removable media might be overridden.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure that the disable setting for automount is enforced in GDM.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: GDM is not configured to disable autorun, potentially exposing the system.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Enable the autorun-never option in GDM.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: The autorun-never setting in GDM is not enforced.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the autorun-never option remains enabled and cannot be overridden.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: XDMCP is enabled in the bootloader configuration, potentially exposing the system to remote graphical logins.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable XDMCP in GDM to secure remote access.
